## Widget Bite

**Add some small components (such as visitor count, voting, and a beautiful banner) to your README to make your project more engaging and interesting.**

[![ref-online-tool]](https://widgetbite.com/)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://widgetbite.com/)

### Parameters

#### Visitor Stats

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `username` | `string` | `true` |  | Github username |  |

</details>

```txt
https://widgetbite.com/stats/{username}
```

#### Banner

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `title` | `string` |  |  | Title |  |
| `subtitle` | `string` |  |  | Subtitle |  |
| `titletransform` | `string` |  | `none` | Title transform | Supported: `none` `rotate` `skew` `scale`. |
| `subtitletransform` | `string` |  | `none` | Subtitle transform | Supported: `none` `rotate` `skew` `scale`. |
| `fontpalette` | `string` |  | `none` | Text palette | Supported: `none` `water` `harvest` `twilight` `pastels` `jungle` `fusion` `autumn`. |
| `backgroundpalette` | `string` |  | `none` | Background palette | Supported: `none` `water` `harvest` `twilight` `pastels` `jungle` `fusion` `autumn`. |

</details>

```txt
https://widgetbite.com/banner{?title,subtitle,titletransform,subtitletransform,fontpalette,backgroundpalette}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- xiaohuohumax -->
![Visitor Stats](https://widgetbite.com/stats/xiaohuohumax)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://widgetbite.com/stats/xiaohuohumax" alt="Visitor Stats" />
</div>

```markdown
![Banner](https://widgetbite.com/banner?title=Badge%20Collection&subtitle=&backgroundpalette=pastels&fontpalette=pastels&titletransform=rotate)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://widgetbite.com/banner?title=Badge%20Collection&#38;subtitle=&#38;backgroundpalette=pastels&#38;fontpalette=pastels&#38;titletransform=rotate" alt="Banner" />
</div>
